name: M2C2
description: External module to support deployment of m2c2kit (a library for cross-platform cognitive assessments) on REDCap.

action-tags.description:
Used to deploy m2c2kit cognitive assessments. Please visit the 'M2C2 Docs' page located in the 'External Modules' side menu for more information.

The @M2C2 action tag should be added to the first note box for each assessment. The action tag should be in the following format:

@M2C2={
    "activity_name":"activity_name",
    "api_key":"api_key",
    "study_id":"study_id",
    "width":"width",
    "height":"height",
    "show_quit_button":"show_quit_button",
    "participant_id":"participant_id",
    "admin_type":"admin_type",
    "redcap_fields":"redcap_fields",
    "number_of_trials":"number_of_trials",
    "session_id":"session_id"
}

Example for a Symbol Search assessment using two trials (note boxes named m2c2_symbol_search_trial_1 and m2c2_symbol_search_trial_2):

@M2C2={
    "activity_name":"symbol-search",
    "api_key":"demo",
    "study_id":"demo",
    "width":400,
    "height":1000,
    "show_quit_button":false,
    "participant_id":"None",
    "admin_type":"qualtrics",
    "fields":["m2c2_symbol_search_trial_1","m2c2_symbol_search_trial_2"]
}
